availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel L. Baird (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Tabitha Ann Bennett Baird in Ohio County, Kentucky, on August 26, 1850. Father of Keron R. Baird, Joseph H. Baird, Sarah S. Baird, Thomas L. Baird, Charles D. Baird, Elizabeth Baird, James A. Baird, Abba L. Baird.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 60.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 1.
Find A Grave, "Tabitha Ann Baird (c1834-June 7, 1920)," Memorial #8937826, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8937826 (accessed January 9, 2019).
Find A Grave, "S. L. Baird (January 27, 1824-July 22, 1913)," Memorial #8937833, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8937833 (accessed January 9, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 001913021, p. 628.
